STFmaryville, you are a miracle worker!  Maybe you should move to D.C. and help Congress solve the budget deficit problem or move to California and invent a better electric car. ;)


How did you find this!?!  I have been looking for it online for a while now and the TPB is also out of print.  Thank you so much for posting this.  You really are the best.  I guess I will have to think harder and find some way to stump you in the future.  Cheers!

there is a site and pirate bay doesn't let me link to it but take the dashes out of i-s-o-h-u-n-t and add dot com. its search feature searches contents of torrents not just the title. you can find older torrents there also. i just typed in gray area and one torrent from 4 1/2 years ago had all image comics beginning with "G"
